title: Sri Lanka inflation 2.3-pct in January 2026, food prices spike
byline: Year-on-year food inflation accelerated to 3.3 percent in January from 3.0 percent in December.

title: Sri Lanka sells extra Rs6bn Treasury bonds after auction
byline: Bringing the total of bonds sold in the week to 185.062 billion

title: Sri Lanka construction increased in December 2025, despite weather: PMI
byline: firms reported expansion in construction activities during the period, despite initial operational disturbances
